name: Flame Body
description: Due to your flame body, you are faster in hot biomes or if you're on fire, but slower in wet/cold biomes. You also take significantly more damage from freezing, and slowly freeze while it's snowing. You're also immune to fire resistance (why would you need it?).

badges.text: Slowness in cold biomes can be countered by setting yourself on fire while slowness in wet biomes can be countered with conduit power.
